SYSTEM: Map4RDF_Poster.pdf: Página 1
Map-based visualization for Linked Data
http://geo.linkeddata.es/web/guest/map4rdf
Screenshots
Functionality
map4rdf
map4rdf
Map4RDF is a mapping and faceted browsing tool for exploring and visualizing RDF 
datasets enhanced with geospatial information.
Conﬁgurable faceted browser interface.
Visualization of geometries (LineString, 
Polygons, etc.).
Supports different data models: 
GeoLinkedData, DBpedia, VCard.
Visualization of statistical data using 
SCOVO.
Support for Web Map Services (WMS).
Faceted browsing
Statistics overlay
Geometries
SPARQL
Endpoint
map4rdf
Server
Visualization in
User’s Browser
Multitier Architecture
